Very interesting Nellie!  I don't know a click of Chinese, but I will have to try this in Polish or German.
   
  Juli

rednellie <rednellie@...> wrote:
          I was trying to teach my ghost pal Oscar how to say "Happy New Year!" in 
Mandarin Chinese. It sounds roughly like "gong she fa sigh". I'm 
pretty impressed. He got all but the last syllable. This is comparable 
to an experiment I just did with my husband, asking him to repeat that 
to me. He got all but the last syllable, too.

Nellie
